# AYESHA ENTERPRISES



**Electrical • Mechanical • Infrastructure Works**

**Established: 2018**



---



## Company Introduction



Ayesha Enterprises is a professionally managed proprietorship firm established in 2018, engaged in execution of **Electrical, Mechanical and Allied Infrastructure Works**. The firm has been consistently delivering quality-driven services to government, semi-government and private sector clients, with a strong focus on safety, compliance, timelines and cost effectiveness.



With a technically skilled team and hands-on project execution capability, Ayesha Enterprises undertakes projects ranging from LT/HT electrical works, DG sets, UPS systems, internal & external electrification, earthing, lighting, panels, and associated mechanical works.



---



## Our Vision



To become a trusted and preferred infrastructure services partner by delivering reliable, safe and technically sound solutions while maintaining the highest standards of professionalism and ethics.



---



## Our Commitment



* Timely execution of projects

* Compliance with relevant IS standards and specifications

* Safety-first approach at site

* Cost-effective and optimized solutions

* Long-term client relationships through performance and trust



---



## Nature of Services



**Electrical Works**



* Internal & External Electrification

* LT Panels, Cabling & Termination

* Street Lighting & Area Lighting

* Earthing & Lightning Protection

* UPS Systems & Batteries

* DG Sets Installation & Commissioning



**Mechanical & Allied Works**



* Equipment installation support

* HVAC associated electrical works

* Infrastructure support services



---



## Organizational Structure



* **Proprietor / Managing Head**

* **Project Manager**

* **Site Engineers / Supervisors**

* **Skilled & Semi‑Skilled Workforce**



---



## Key Strengths



* Experienced site execution team

* Familiarity with government tender procedures

* Strong vendor & supplier network

* Quality workmanship and supervision

* Flexibility to handle fast‑track projects



---

## Health, Safety & Quality (HSEQ)



Ayesha Enterprises follows strict safety norms at site and ensures use of PPE, proper supervision and adherence to approved drawings and specifications. Quality checks are performed at every stage of execution.
